articles.title: After Samrat Prithviraj, Akshay Kumar responds to claim he doesn't commit to movies: 'My 8 hours are equal to 14-15 hours of other stars' - The Indian Express
articles.description: Amid speculation that Akshay Kumar doesn't commit to a movie as he does 3-4 projects every year, the actor has finally responded. He said that his 8 hours on a film set are equal to 14-15 hours of other stars.
